website_summaries.verdict: A fast router that stands out for its performance and its ability to optimize gaming traffic.
pros: Features 4 x 4 MU-MIMO and beamforming technologies
Stream boost optimization improves streaming and gaming
Device is physically designed to run cooler than other options
cons: The documentation and software here can be confusing
Some reports that these arrive with missing parts

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for OpenWRT
customer_reviews.text: As I write this in July 2018, this is the best inexpensive router/AP hardware for OpenWRT. This has a really nice 4GB flash disk in it, half a gigabyte of RAM, decent processors, a10k WiFi chips that have good Open Source drivers, gigabyte ethernet, and USB 3. I installed the 18.06.0-rc1 pre-release, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Perens

customer_reviews.title: Solid Wifi Router
customer_reviews.text: Review for Zyxel Armor Z2 AC2600. I have been using this wifi router for a few weeks now. Pros: - Strong, solid 2.4 ghz wifi signal - Excellent interface and many options - Rock solid. I've had no reason to reboot it except for configuration changes and firmware update - Does not run hot - Looks cool and comes packaged in the nicest box I've ever seen a computer product come in Neutral: - 5 ghz signal is solid but only average strength Cons: - None so far I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good for a year
customer_reviews.text: It was good for a little over a year. After that, it just will not give me the proper speeds that my isp offers. I had to get my isp to get me one of their routers to get the proper speed. This is advertised to be good to over a gigabyte and it will not even do over 180mbps over a hardline ethernet cable. I am going to try and contact the manufacturer to see if they will help me.
customer_reviews.author: Evolutionarytheory

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome router! Of course compared to my old router provided by my ISP and I expected great results but I was blown out of the water with the throughput rates of this device! Via ethernet Im getting 170Mbps down and 25up while on my old router it was 120down. I also stream and with a 8000 bitrate Im not getting any dropped frames and the stream looks excellent. The wifi signal and speed is great. This router is just awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Rolo

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade From an Old Netgear
customer_reviews.text: Had to upgrade from my old netgear DGL-4300 from yearsssss ago. This router is faster and does the job quite well for online gaming and mass amount of downloads at the same time. The price point is great for what I am using it for and the signal reaches from the back of the house to my car parked on the street.
customer_reviews.author: R Y.

customer_reviews.title: Best router experience I've had to date.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this router to provision it with OpenWRT. The hardware in this router provides such a pleasant OpenWRT experience. Never once had an actual problem with this router, it has been running strong for 2+ years now.
customer_reviews.author: Bumpertree

customer_reviews.title: Good Router, Little Exspensive.
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit to set up with the modem, but once set up, it runs perfectly. Like the feature to map out and see all connected devices. Wish there was an app however to connect and monitor with your phone. Good speeds, good WiFi. Price is slightly higher than expected but I'm content.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly powerful
customer_reviews.text: I bought it purely for OpenWRT – with 1.7 GHz CPU, USB3.0, 512 MB RAM, 4GB flash and AC wireless there is no task this router can't handle. Considering the wi-fi problems of the closest alternatives (Linksys WRT AC series), this is the best choice on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Pavel Samarkin

customer_reviews.title: Not bad not good.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and strong signal but my older one beat it in real world ping test. So i think it’s over priced. Gonna update firmware and run it again in couple days then update review. Update: sending it back. Ordered better one for same price.
customer_reviews.author: constantin

customer_reviews.title: I expected awesome. I got it.
customer_reviews.text: My four-year-old Zyxel router was getting a bit long in the tooth, so I replaced it with the new model. I had extremely high expectations, and the Z2 met all of them. The interface is accessible enough for anyone to setup in a few seconds, and the expert mode provides all the tools a power user could possibly want. Signal range and strength are excellent. What has really sold Zyxel as a brand to me, and why I really recommend them to others, is that their routers actually do real QoS right out of the box. No need to go under the hood either, the factory settings are already perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great router
customer_reviews.text: Very easy setup. I bought this to replace a Netgear R6100. This router has notably faster speed and dead spots both upstairs and downstairs are gone. Before, when we streamed across 2 or more tvs/devices, the connection slowed down causing choppiness and buffering in the videos. That problem is remedied.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey P. Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but it's horrible... specs seem nice but it's a trap.
customer_reviews.text: The router seems like it works fine but allnof a suddwn it just stops working and you have to reset all the settings for it to work again. It is highly unreliable and a waste of money. I had accumulated enough rewards on Amazon.com to pay for it in full and I feel robbed.
customer_reviews.author: Josean Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: great range
customer_reviews.text: bought another brand .here w/2yr warranty it failed 13 month later .this unit works very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Easy!
customer_reviews.text: We've had it about a week, and so far, so good. Hands down the easiest router setup ever for a non-techie like me. We got it because our old router wasn't playing well with new technology and would go into these rapid cycles of connecting then dropping signal. Since getting this new router, my son's new gaming computer, our Xbox One, and my laptop are all playing nicely on the 5Ghz band, and our various phones, tablets, etc. are all humming along on the 2.4Ghz band with NO DROPS! So happy with my choice!
customer_reviews.author: CIserhardt

customer_reviews.title: This router is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had the Nighthawk R7000 and was experiencing slow speeds with my new gigabit internet. I have to say, this router blows the Nighthawk out of the water!! My speeds went form 75mbs to 300mbs!!! I'd highly recommend this router to anyone with a larger house looking for speed and reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Holy quickness
customer_reviews.text: Took me a long time to do my research on a router that would be optimal for gaming and boy did i hit the jack pot. I have had 0 issues with this router and I've had it for about a month now. I am extremely satisfied with my boosted speeds along with the easy setup interface.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Muetzel

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup  and FAST, FAST and FAST!
customer_reviews.text: This router was easy to setup in minutes and it blows away Wi-Fi speeds from the router provided by my cable company. The One Connect app is very useful in monitoring Wi-Fi traffic and turning on guest Wi-Fi. Also, it looks cool to boot!
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Zyxel Armor Z2 AC2600 MU-MIMO Wireless Router - Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this gaming router. Price was right, a breeze to set up, wired and wireless gaming no problems. Very happy with this purchase. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Steve F.

customer_reviews.title: Wifi speed is fast, when it's connected. But the connection keeps dropping few times/day
customer_reviews.text: Wifi speed is fast, when it's connected. But the connection keeps dropping few times/day, which is very annoying...
customer_reviews.author: NHK

customer_reviews.title: Great router, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Great router, easy setup. Watching 4k ultra-hd steaming with no buffering. Also improved the stability of the signal going to an older Roku stick in a distant bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: They work great. I did build a custom firmware image for ...
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased two of the Zyxel Armor Z2 AC2600 MU-MIMO Wireless Router. They work great. I did build a custom firmware image for these, but that was my preference as I wanted to run LEDE stable, whose default image does not fully work on these.
customer_reviews.author: fluffybiz

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far (approx
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far (approx. 2 months). I have only had to reboot once, and that was probably Comcast's issue and not the router. I can now get a wifi signal in my detached garage, where I could not before with my old router. This router also fixed my issue with my new Samsung smart TV continually losing it's connection after a restart, which it never does now.
customer_reviews.author: Merle

customer_reviews.title: boot up
customer_reviews.text: could not set up unit it booted up and then would not boot after that called support and they could not help me so i sent it back for a refund
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Very good router
customer_reviews.text: Im using the router for almost 3 months now and i find it worth the price. I have one problem is that sometimes the routers restarts suddenly. it happened to me twice maybe. other than that it's so worth the price and the Wifi signal is very good
customer_reviews.author: abdulrahman

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed with the speed, I use a Speedtest app- and realy like the way this router optimizes devices.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! Good work Zyxel!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing support! This guys did provide me custom good working firmware in less than a day after I did explain them issue. Amazing product! I did connect all my 30 devices to this router and everything works like a charm! Amazing performance! Can watch HD on multiple devices! Amazing subset of features! Disable front blinkers, sync iOS photo library, device management, etc
customer_reviews.author: razgon

customer_reviews.title: I am not very happy with this router
customer_reviews.text: I am not very happy with this router. Ever since the internet company hooked it up its been a problem. It works fine for a day then I loss my internet. I unplug it, it boots up and works fine for a day , then I have to go thru the same process again.. It has to be the unit because after I re- boot it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expert Wireless Router
customer_reviews.text: It is a little hard to set up but WOW is it fast.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Catherine Cumberland

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Wi-Fi speed
customer_reviews.text: This router provides very awesome Wi-Fi speed, cool black and yellow gold design, but some disappointed features - after get out stickers from gold lines some pieces of paint were gone with stickers. In addition router has very real easy configuration.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance, some issues with the interface having invisible ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Performance , some issues with the interface having invisible test but was easy to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device so far. No issues, really like the integrated resource monitor
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: So far very good.
customer_reviews.text: Only had for a month and is working well. No disconnects or renegotiations which was too frequent with previous router and was the rationale for this purchase. So far very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Router... But be wary
customer_reviews.text: Great router while it worked. After about 7 months the wireless radio began to fail and connections were constantly lost.
customer_reviews.author: Nirvelock

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: not a long range wifi signal as it was advertise....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was excited for the product to arrive however became very disappointed when it arrived in an open box. The power cord and the cable were not in the provided plastic bag. Attempted to hook up the router anyway only to find out someone else had obviously returned this unit previously as it had already been configured/renamed and none of the manufacturer provided passwords would work. Sent back for refund right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

product_meta.title: Zyxel Armor Z2 AC2600 MU-MIMO Wireless Router with StreamBoost and Beamforming Antennas [NBG6817]
product_meta.description: Style:Z2 AC2600Have more devices connected to your shared Internet with ZyXEL Armor Z2 AC2600 MU-MIMO Dual-Band wireless Gigabit router. Powered by a fast 1.7 GHz processor and streamboosttm technology, the Armor Z2 allows you to experience 4k UHD video streaming and to play online games without stuttering, while to have more devices staying connected at the same time without sacrificing performance. The ZyXEL Armor Z2 is equipped with the latest 4x4 MU-MIMO technology that enables it to accelerate transmission up to 4 stream wireless devices for even faster Wi-Fi speeds. Supersonic Quad stream WiFi AC2600 get the latest wireless 802.11AC standard speeds. With up to 2600 Mbps of combined wireless speeds, stream High definition movies without stutters, transfer files quicker to your mobile devices, play online games without the High latency. Beamforming coverage unlike traditional wireless where it scatters it signals everywhere, the Armor Z2 Pinpoints your wireless device and focuses its wireless connection solely to that device, enabling strong wireless signals.
feature_bullets: 2nd generation AC2600 chipset for 2600 Mbps speed 802.11ac
4x4 MU-MIMO technology that enables accelerated transmission to wireless devices for even faster Wi-Fi speeds
Stream boost optimization to deliver the best gaming and streaming experience
Beam forming antennas for enhanced wireless coverage and stability
Easy setup wtih Easy 123 and user freindly usage monitoring.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars127 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
